article_title: One Barbara Ingram teacher, five curious characters
article_text:

og.description: Dale Stein needs only one chair to accommodate the five characters she plays in her one-woman show. But she hopes all 80 seats in the Black Box Theatre at Barbara Ingram School for the Arts are full for her upcoming pair of performances. With tickets
